ModMetaData.name: Food Bowl
ModMetaData.author: Programmer Lily
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a Food Bowl - a single-stack storage building specifically designed for storing any type of food. Works like a shelf but holds only one stack and is optimized for food storage.
Features: - Single-stack food storage - Prevents food deterioration - Accepts all food types (raw, cooked, meals) - Cheap and easy to build - Small 1x1 footprint
